Sequence Information.Peptide Name: HE2beta2 (natural AMPs; human, primates, mammals, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows 38.1% similarity toscorpion Buthinin.  4C. Molecular formula:   C172H279N61O49S5; Mol Wt 4158.825; GRAVY= -0.6; Wimley-White whole-residue hydrophobicity of the peptide: 5.44  kcal/mol.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 6.4 uM).Synergy:antibiotics:  The ciprofloxacin/HE2beta2 or doxycycline/HE2beta2 combination exhibited the best synergistic inhibition (FICI 0.26Â±0.01).
Literature Information.Author: Yenugu S, Narmadha G.2010
Literature Information.Title: The human male reproductive tract antimicrobial peptides of the HE2 family exhibit potent synergy with standard antibiotics
